about.description:
I'm a passionate software engineer who loves cyberpunk aesthetics and futuristic design. With over 5 years of experience in web development, I create immersive digital experiences that combine cutting-edge technology with stunning visuals.

My journey in software development began at the University of Dhaka, where I earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.

I specialize in React, Next.js, Three.js, and Node.js, with a strong focus on creating performant, accessible, and visually stunning user interfaces.

I'm passionate about staying at the forefront of web technology and constantly expanding my skillset to deliver the best possible solutions.

blog.title: Building Immersive 3D Experiences with Three.js and React
blog.excerpt: Learn how to create stunning 3D web experiences by combining the power of Three.js and React.
blog.content:
Three.js is a powerful JavaScript library that makes it easy to create and display animated 3D computer graphics in a web browser. When combined with React, it opens up a world of possibilities for creating immersive web experiences.

In this tutorial, we'll cover everything from basic scene setup to advanced animation techniques. You'll learn how to:

  • Set up a Three.js scene in a React component
  • Create and manipulate 3D objects
  • Add lighting and shadows
  • Implement camera controls
  • Create responsive animations

By the end, you'll have all the knowledge you need to build stunning 3D experiences for your web applications.

blog.title: Optimizing React Applications for Performance
blog.excerpt: Discover practical techniques to improve the performance of your React applications.
blog.content:
Performance optimization is crucial for delivering a good user experience in React applications. In this article, we'll explore several techniques to improve your app's performance.

Code Splitting

Break your bundle into smaller chunks to reduce initial load time using dynamic imports and React.lazy().

Memoization

Use React.memo, useMemo, and useCallback to prevent unnecessary re-renders and calculations.

Efficient State Management

Structure your state properly and use appropriate tools like Context API, Redux, or Zustand depending on your needs.

Virtual List

Implement virtualization for long lists to render only visible items using libraries like react-window or react-virtualized.

blog.title: The Future of Web Development: AI Integration
blog.excerpt: Explore how artificial intelligence is transforming web development workflows.
blog.content:
Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing how we approach web development. From code generation to design assistance and testing automation, AI tools are becoming an integral part of a developer's toolkit.

AI-Powered Code Generation

Tools like GitHub Copilot and other AI coding assistants can help write boilerplate code, suggest optimizations, and even implement entire features based on comments.

Design and UX Enhancements

AI-driven design tools can generate UI components, suggest accessibility improvements, and help create more intuitive user experiences.

Personalization at Scale

Implement intelligent content and feature recommendations tailored to individual user preferences and behaviors.

Automated Testing and QA

Use AI to generate test cases, identify potential bugs, and streamline the quality assurance process.
